name: Go Go Tsomo
description: GoGoTsomo is a die an retry game. Use your webcam to control Tsomo. You have to deliver the mail at the temple, be careful not to fall down. This game was designed by 5 Gobelins students: Thibault Demars, Laure Poulard, Hervé Rabinasoa, Rémi Rucojević, Alassane Coly-Arogundad
